arts.ttl: Derby County survival bid hits buffers as winning run ends
arts.sum: Derby's fight for survival under new boss John Eustace hit the buffers as their four-match winning streak was ended by a 80th-minute goal from Swansea's Eom Ji-sung to earn the home side a 1-0 win. It’s 50 years since Derby County were crowned Kings of England for the second time and in our special edition we dip into the archives of the Derby Telegraph to review the campaign and highlight some of the key games.
